title: Unable to connect to the login queue

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I and some other people on the Reddit are having this issue atm. The client told me to use the hextech support tool and I did, but it didn't fix the problem.

replies.body: Oh actually this is the same problem I'm having.

It looks like we might have had a little hiccup with the login servers. I want to make sure to fully troubleshoot this before we jump to any conclusions, so do me a favor and run through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick. Hit me back up after and let me know if it helped!
